Sentencas: A homogeneous dispersion of fine CuO in a gadolinia-doped ceria (CGO) ceramic matrix by the polymeric organic complex solution method has been achieved.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties

Sentencas: Highly sinterable powders were prepared by this method after calcining the precursor at 600 degrees C and attrition milled.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties

Sentencas: The powders consist of individual particles of few tens of nanometer in size with a low agglomeration state.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties

Sentencas: The isopressed compacts were sintered in air at 1000 degrees C and reducing in N-2 90%-H-2 10% atmosphere to form Cu-CGO cermets.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties

Sentencas: The microstructures showed a uniform distribution of porous metallic Cu particles surrounded by microporous been spaces.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties

Sentencas: The influence of Cu content in Cu-CGO cermets on the electrode performance has been investigated in order to create the most suitable microstructure.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties

Sentencas: The electrical properties of Cu-CGO cermets have been also studied using impedance spectroscopy, in the temperature range form 150 to about 700 degrees C in argon atmosphere.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties

Sentencas: These measurements determined a high value of electrical conductivity at 700 degrees C, similar to that corresponded to pure metallic cupper.
Titulo: Low-temperature preparation by polymeric complex solution synthesis of Cu-Gd-doped ceria cermets for solid oxide fuel cells anodes: Sinterability, microstructures and electrical properties
